events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer role. Thank you for applying to our company and expressing interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been categorized under the software engineer position based on the experience and skills mentioned in your resume.
A recruiter has been assigned to your application and will be your point of contact for all further communication regarding the software engineering role.
We have completed an initial screening of your software developer profile and are impressed with your background. We look forward to moving ahead with the next steps.
Thank you for your prompt response and for confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interviews.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 11:00 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly for the software engineering coding challenges.
You have successfully completed the technical interview round. The interviewers were pleased with your problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 3:00 PM UTC. This will cover culture fit and your expectations for the software engineering role.
You completed the HR interview successfully. The HR team appreciated your communication skills and enthusiasm for joining our engineering department.
We are pleased to extend you an offer for the software engineer position. The offer details have been sent to your email for your review.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We are thrilled to know you are excited about joining our engineering team.
We have received your confirmation accepting our software engineering position offer. Welcome aboard to our engineering team!
Your onboarding process has officially started. We look forward to supporting you in becoming a valuable software developer at our company.
The hiring process for your software engineer position has been successfully completed. We are excited to have you as part of the engineering team.
